byang chub seMs dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i Ti ka

lg.l: bder gshegs sras bcas chos kyi sku mnga' ba ||
phyag 'os kun la gus pas phyag 'tshal te ||
rgyal sras spyod la 'jug pa'i tshig dang don ||
lung bzhin legs bshad rtogs pa dran phyir bri ||

ab.note: Having bowed down respectfully to the Sugata together with his Sons, who possesses the body of the doctrine, and to all who are worth worshiping, I will write a correct explanation of the words and meaning of the “Entrance Gate into the Practice of the Sons of the Victorious One” in conformity with Scriptures, in order to remember (my) understanding.

body.ab:
'grel pa 'khan shes rab blo gros na re | spangs pa chos
gsum dang ldan pa de gang zag brgyad las khyad par du byas pa ste | so so'i skye bo dang | bsam brtan dang po nas srid rtse'i bar kyi phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang | 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang | lan cig phyir 'ong pa dang | bya chub sems pa dang | phyir mi 'ong pa dang | dgra' bcom pa dang | rang rgyal ba rnams las so |

gzhung 'og ma ma sbyar kyang logs su thob byed pas skyon .... tha dad de bsaM pa phun suM tshogs pa ni thar pa'i .... gyi dge rtsa bsod naMs bya pa 'dod pa'i blo yin la ... dang 'bras bu dkon mchog dang bden pa la ... pa yin no zhes slob dpon ..... gzhung 'og ma nas ni phan yon ston par | 'grel par 'chad pa ltar nyid legs par sems ste | mod sde du ma nas kyang dal 'byor snyid dka' ba ni chos mang po la 'chad pa'i phyir ro |

'thed'thad pa las smon pa phan yon dang ldan pa'i 'dad pa sems can rnams kyi glad nad tsam zhes gsungs ste | mo'u 'khan na re sman pa lta bu' bla sngan la ma bltos par sems can gyi glad nad gsal lo zhes bsams na 'ang bsod nams dpag med pa dang ldan na zhes 'grel pas 'chad mod kyi |

rgyu kyabs 'gro' khyad par can de nyid kyang sems skyed dang 1 yin pas de seMs skyed'i sngon du skyabs 'gro khyad par can ma song bassong {°} bas | de nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir rgyu' skyabs 'gro med pas 'bras bu sems bstan mi skye bar 'gyur ro || ¦

kha cig mar lo na re
sems bskyed
pa ni gzhan don phyir ||
yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod || ces seMs skyed ni gzhan kho na'i don du byang chub du 'dod pa yin la | skyabs 'gro ni rang gzhan gnyi' ga'i don du 'dod pa yin no zhes pa ni mi rigs ste | de yang snying brtse' las rig bya'o zhes skyabs 'gro' yang gzhan don du bshad pa'i phyir ro ||

skye ba yin na nyan thos kyang snying rje can du gyur pas |°°°...°°° 'dod par mi nus te theg pa chen po snyingpo {°} snying rjes khyad par du ji ltar 'byed‹'›byed | gzhan yang mod ste rgyan du sems bskyed pa'i skabs su don che yang dag bsgrub pa'i bya ba byed ces rang dang gzhan gyi don chen po bsgrub par bshad pas | seMs kyed yang gzhan kho'i ched ma yin par ja"ja" in dbu can zhes pa'o ||

skyabs su 'gro' ba ni ngag gis 'khor lo yin no || zhes mdo 'ga' nas 'byung la ¦ kha cig na re dper na skyel ma zhu
bar 'dod pa'i mi la ngag gi brda' ma sprad na zhu' bar 'dod pa'i bsam pas tsam gyis zhus pa'i go mi tshad pa bzhin du brjoddu {°°} brjod pas khyab po zhes 'bre zer ro ||

'phags pa chos bzhi pa'ibzhi'{i} pa'i mdo las 'byung pa bzhin stobs rnam pa bzhi' ste rngog loThe reading "rngog lo" is uncertain; no "o" is visible; the gloss could also read "rtag lo" 'i zhal nas rgyud gcig °°° gnyen po dge ba'i stobs rgyud la skyed pas °°° yin pas stobs bsuM po gnyen no ¦...°°°...°°° sun 'byin pa dang | sten dang ¦
gnyen po dang | sor chud pa'i stobs so ||

zangs kar kha cig na re rang bzhin °°° dang bcas pa'i ltung pa tshan tshan du bsdebs te | dpe chung du byas nas rtogs par sla'o
zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de |
°°°°°° bslab pa ma slangs pa rnams kyis nyon °°°°°° mongs pas nyes spyod la zhugs pa bzhin no ||

zhes pa man chad degs gzhi'i bsam pa yin te | ched du bya ba sems can gyi don du smon par 'di thams cad don mthun pa'i phyir ro || sbyor ba'i tshe ngag ni sngar bshad pa brgyad de | mchod pa dang | bstod pa dang | phyag brtsal ba dang | skyabs su 'gro ba dang | sdig pa bshags pa dang | rjes su yi rang pa dang |
bskul ba dang | gsol ba 'o zhes nga"nga" in dbu can gsung yang | bsngo' ba med na sbyor ba ma tshang par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang | lus dang de bzhin long spyod dang || ces pa man chad ni bsam pa 'di ltar bskyed par bya' zhes dngos gzhi'o bsam pa'i khyad par du snang la | mdun du nye bar gnas gyur cig zhes pa yan chad ni 'di ltar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ba nyid du snang pa'i phyir |
sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi sa 'tshams lo tsasmdzad pa ltar legs par sems sa"sa" in dbu can so |

gzhan yang °°°'tshal la gnyen kur kyi mchod par °°°°°° med pa'i phyir gsung pa la bstod pa dang phyag btsal ba yang bkur ti'i mchod pa zhes ming du brtags pa la nyes pa med de | gzhung gi glad du mchod brjod brjod pa bzhin no || des na dge ba'i lha dang su ma ti lasogs pa 'gro ba dang stod °u sogs pa thams cad dngos gzhir 'chad pa 'aM | 'grel chen mkhan kyiskyi‹s› dam bca' ba
tshigs su brjod pa la thug pa thams cad bsngo' bar byas ste sbyor bar 'chad pa ni ma legs par sems so ||

'dir kha cig ni re | las dang po bas sems bskyed pa mi bya' ste | mi skye ba'i phyir dang | skyeskyes kyang nyams par
'gyur bas | slar nyes pa che pa'i phyir ro || zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de | snying rje can byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yang yod la | dge' bshes la brten pa 'am | thos bsam lasogs pas bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa yod pa la mi skye ba'i tan tshigs ma grub te ci 'i phyir mi skye | nyams °° gtantan tshigs yang ma grub ste bshes gnyen rten pa lasogs pa rkyen bzang po dang 'brel pas mi nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang | °°°°°
nyams kyang sdeig pa sbyangs zhes yang gsos btab pa'i sgo nas gnyen po goms nas bstan par 'gyur ba'i 'ang phyir dang | byed pa rgyu' mthun skye ba gzhan du 'phen pa'i phyir | sems bskyed pa don yod pa kho na'o ||

kha cig na re dal 'byor yang khyad par can te | so sor thar pa'i rten du rung pa kho na ste | so sor tha pa myed na sems bskyed pa nyid mi 'chags pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro || de ni mi rigs ste | pham pa byung
pa 'am 'tshams med pa dang 'brel pa lasogs pa la so sor 'thar pa med kyang ° yang sems skye ba'i phyir dang | so sor thar pa ni ji srid 'tsho' ba yin pas tshe 'das pa na gtong yang de tsam kyi bya sems mi gtong pa'i phyir ro ||

dge bshes rgya'i lugs la bzhi las dang po gzhan gyi lugs gi spyad pa ni dge slong mas rgyal po'i chang
ba bcad pa'i mi nges par 'tsho' bar 'gyur ba sdug bsngal drag po can 'gyur byed kyi lan tsha brlud pas myur du gsod pa ni snying rjes ma bzod pa'i spyod pa yin kyang pham pa byung pa mod nas bshad pa'i phyir dge' slong lasogs pas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ° ni snying rje chen pos kyang de lta bu bkag la | byang chub sems dpa ni bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir slab bya 'gal ba kho na'o |

ber 'gon kha cig na re skar ma'i spyod pa lta bu byed na so sor thar pa dbul
zhing | tshong pa g.yon can gsod pa lasogs pa'i skabs su dbul mi dgos so zhes zer ba ni lung dang rigs pa med pa'i phyir dang | so sor thar pa'i pham pa'i yan lag tshang par mtshungs pa'i phyir tsam par 'gyur bas mnyam du dbul dgos pa kho na'o ||

bzhi pa gzhan lugs dgag pa ni | zhang tshes na re so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i ngo bo bzhan la gnod ba bzhi' dang bcas pa las ldog pa
tsam snyen gnas yan chad gcig rten du yang dgos shing | theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal ba de ni thun mong pa spyi yin la | so so 'i khyad par byang seMs kyi so sor thar pa ni rgyun chags pa dang | gzhan rjes su bsrung pa dang | slar gso' bar rung pa yin pa dang | de dag las ldog nyan thos kyi so sor thar pa yin pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa'i phyir ro ||

slob dpon shan ti bas 'don no skad do | | 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
khyim pa la rtsa ba ba hi' char dang rab du byung pa la mi tshegs par spyod pa ma rtogs pa thams cad gnang ngo zhes kha cig zer ba ni mi 'thad de | dge' slong lasogs pa 'i rtsa ba bzhi' thams cad du gnas pa'i skabs med par bcas pa'i phyir | bcas pa'i pham pa bzhi' char la 'gyur bas sdom pa nyams su 'gyur ba'i phyir | sdom pa phul la 'jug par bya'o || des na bram
ze'i khye' bu skar ma lo khe' stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas | gzhan kho na'i don du tshangs spyod gtuang yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang | | de yon gyi tshong pa g.yon can bsad kyang ngan 'gror ma skyes pa lasogs pa thabs la mkhas pa'i mod lasogs pa nas gsungs so ||
